text:
Pieter "Piet" Bukman (born 7 February 1934) is a retired Dutch politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Appeal (CDA) party. He also is an economist.
Bukman was President of the European People's Party from 10 July 1985 until 30 July 1987. After the election of 1986 Bukman was appointed as Minister for Development Cooperation.
